channel.title: Innovate on Yufan Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Innovate on Yufan Zhang

item.title: NFT Marketplace: How to Choose the Right NFT Marketplace for Artists and Collectors
item.description: Authors: Yufan Zhang, Zichao Chen SciEcon NFT Research Lab, SciEcon CIC Medium Introduction In the article NFT Marketplace: Introduction to NFT and NFT Marketplace’s Mechanism, we have given you the primary mechanism of NFT and the specialized NFT marketplaces. NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), records on a blockchain that represents pieces of digital media, have become extremely popular this year. NFT marketplaces around the world play a vital role in the trading and liquidity of NFTs.

item.title: Evaluating Higher Education Using Machine Learning
item.description: Authors: Qinwanxian Liu, Chenyu Wang, Yufan Zhang Meritotious Winner for MCM/ICM 2022 PDF | Certificate Abstract Higher education is a core component of a sustainable society. It has gained significant momentum worldwide over the last three decades. To fairly evaluate the quality and sustainability of the existing higher education system in different countries, we constructed a Back-Propagation neuro network model. We assess seven representative countries. In the first part, we carefully selected indices including enrollment ratio, Gender Parity Index, the number of Nobel prizes in different countries.
